trait.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
entries: If the dragonborn fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragonborn makes two Greataxe attacks.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Necrotic Breath {@recharge}
entries: The dragonborn exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) necrotic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the dragonborn for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
